serial.description: Analyze historical marine weather data and provide insights
serial.query: Analyze the historical marine weather data for ${$transformHistoricalMarine.location}. The data contains daily wave height maximums, dominant wave directions, and wave period maximums. Provide insights about: 1) Wave pattern trends and seasonal variations, 2) Notable wave events and extremes, 3) Wave direction patterns and their implications, 4) Practical observations for marine activities and safety. Include specific data points, averages, and recommendations based on the historical patterns.
